name: places/ChIJTfEpmAtZwokRjlCNrZ0DwXY
formattedAddress: 726 Broadway Suite #350, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 726 Broadway Suite #350, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
I went to the clinic for the appointment I had made 3 months ago. I was waiting my turn without saying anything. The receptionist, ANN GARRIQUES, had a bad attitude and was an extremely racist employee who did not like foreigners. That area was very small and crowded, I think I was a little close to the front desk and she was extremely slow. She told me harshly STEP BACK! If I choose to be treated somewhere I can't have them disrespecting me like that. I took this employee's name and left. If I had read the bad reviews before, I wouldn't have wasted my time like this.
I definitely don't recommend you to come to that clinic and get treatment.

originalText.text:
This place is such a mixed bag but I'm going to comment on the worst of it.

Dr. Talib (he's an oral surgeon) gave me a dire diagnosis without looking at my file. I asked specifically if it could be anything else and he replied "no". Then I said that I had braces, badly done in my 50's and he said oh, that's it then. He would have seen I had braces if he had bothered to look at my file. I'm so glad that I opted for him not to do any work on me.

There is no real accounting department. For 2 years they had not been applying my insurance and then they sent a huge bill. The statement they have sent is unintelligible. I've been told that that's the best they can do because of the accounting program. I've asked for them to figure out a way to show what has been applied to insurance and what has not.

It's shameful that this organization finds this an acceptable way to run the practice. This is so unprofessional.

originalText.text: My jaw locked after getting cavities filled and when I couldn’t get it closed I think my body when in panic mode because I almost fainted in the chair. Jane was the best healthcare worker I’ve ever come across. She massaged my jaw to help it eventually close and helped me calm down. She’s a great dentist and a great person. Hope and pray you get Jane!

Hope and pray you get Jane!

originalText.text: My experience with Dr Shi has been incredible.  Dr Shi is the most caring periodontist I’ve ever came across and trust me I’ve had plenty in my lifetime.  Although it’s quite expensive due to the extensive amount of work I need done to bring back my oral health, I’m fully confident in her work.  Dr Shi explains every procedure in details and she has opened my eye to how, why and what needs to be done to achieve my oral healthy.  I’ve been seeing her since August 2022, my confidence was at an all-time low but little by little she’s changing my life and I’ve gained some of my confidence back.  I know I will be very happy with the outcome in the coming months because I’m in great hands.  I recommend Dr Shi 110% to anyone, she’s unlike other periodontist she’s kind and I can tell she love what she does and it shows.  I rarely have a wait time, and if I do, she come to the front desk to reassure me the room is being cleaned for me.  Although it can be a hassle for the front desk employees to get back to me, they are helpful and pleasant.

originalText.text: "Doctor" Talib is a horrible, arrogant, uneducated "dentist". Wish I could give ZERO stars. Never going back to this place. BIG waste of time and money.
